body:
ATTENTION: ARE YOU AWARE?

Are you alive or dead? The reason for this question is that we
received an email from Mrs.Linda Gilbert And she said that you are
dead and you have given her Letter of Authorization before your
death,She also told us that you died on 20th of January 2024 And they
Will buried you on 4th of March 2024 in next month coming.
Furthermore, we told Her that what is holding the Delivery of your
fund which is ($20 million dollars) is the delivery fee of the sum of $25:
dollars only and that the fund has been approved to Deliver in your
favor.

And we asked her to call back on Friday. so that we can confirm from you
first.

Are you aware of this? I want to know whether all this stories are
true about you,she also promised to pay the Delivery fee of the sum of
$25: dollars only on Friday.
If you are alive Please,quickly get back to me to this email address.

with your full information such as your
full name,home,address, phone number and your nearest let me know if
you are alive or not
